results.title: [Effects of lisinopril on platelet aggregation in patients with arterial hypertension with metabolic syndrome].
results.text_hl: [Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Blood_Platelet_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001791 @@@platelet aggregation@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with arterial @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@].

citations.NLM: Medvedev IN, Gromnatskiĭ NI, Golikov BM, Al'-Zuraĭki EM, Li VIu. [Effects of lisinopril on platelet aggregation in patients with arterial hypertension with metabolic syndrome]. Kardiologiia. 2004;44(10):57-9. PMID: 15477792

results.title: Potential pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction between concomitantly administered lisinopril and diclofenac sodium: a call for appropriate management in hypertensive osteoarthritic patients.
results.text_hl: The alterations in serum electrolytes, reduction in % @<m>DISEASE_Blood_Platelet_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001791 @@@platelet aggregation@@@ activity and improvement in @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile was more profound with combination treatment in comparison to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Goswami SK, Jain S, Chudasama H, Santani D. Potential pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction between concomitantly administered lisinopril and diclofenac sodium: a call for appropriate management in hypertensive osteoarthritic patients. Drug Metabol Drug Interact. 2011;26(3):127-37. PMID: 21980964
